description: Light your own fire with this Cajun extravaganza. Lime juice, parsley, chilli and garlic make the chicken, corn and potatoes sing.
name: Cajun Chicken With Tomato Relish Sour Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 block corn cobs, cut in half
4 white washed potatoes, cut into wedges
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, half the oil, seasoning, mustard powder and garlic in a bowl. Cover. Refrigerate for 4 hours to marinate.
Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Brush corn and potatoes with remaining oil. Add to grill. Cook, for 10 minutes on each side or until almost tender.
Add chicken to the grill. Cook for 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through and browned. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes.
Juice 1 lime. Combine sour cream and lime juice in a small bowl. Add relish and fold until just combined.
Cut remaining lime into wedges. Arrange chicken, potatoes and corn on a serving platter. Sprinkle with parsley and chilli. Serve with tomato relish sour cream and lime wedges.
